trans-unit.source: Defines the method that creates a new identity permission.
trans-unit.target: 定義建立新識別 (Identity) 使用權限的方法。

trans-unit.source: Some types of evidence have a corresponding identity permission that is granted to assemblies with that evidence.
trans-unit.target: 某些類型的辨識項會有對應的身份識別權限，授與組件的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: This allows other code to make identity demands, so that only code with a specific piece of evidence will pass.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓其他程式碼進行識別要求，以便只有特定的辨識項的程式碼將會通過。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can demand that your callers have a specific strong name; only callers with that strong name will pass the demand.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可以要求呼叫端具有特定強式名稱;只有強式名稱的呼叫端會傳遞需求。

trans-unit.source: By implementing <xref:System.Security.Policy.IIdentityPermissionFactory> for an evidence object, you provide an implementation of <xref:System.Security.Policy.IIdentityPermissionFactory.CreateIdentityPermission%2A> that the .NET Framework security system can call to get an identity permission that represents that piece of evidence.
trans-unit.target: 藉由實作<xref:System.Security.Policy.IIdentityPermissionFactory>辨識項物件，請您提供的實作<xref:System.Security.Policy.IIdentityPermissionFactory.CreateIdentityPermission%2A>.NET Framework 安全性系統可呼叫以取得代表該片段的辨識項的識別權限。

trans-unit.source: During policy resolution, the security system will call that method on all evidence objects that implement <xref:System.Security.Policy.IIdentityPermissionFactory> and grant the resulting identity permissions to the appropriate assembly.
trans-unit.target: 原則解析期間安全性系統會在所有實作的辨識項物件上呼叫該方法<xref:System.Security.Policy.IIdentityPermissionFactory>和產生的識別權限授與適當的組件。

trans-unit.source: The evidence from which to create the new identity permission.
trans-unit.target: 要建立新識別使用權限的來源辨識項。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new identity permission for the specified evidence.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定辨識項的新識別使用權限。
